website_summaries.verdict: A top-quality tea infuser that is well-constructed, attractive, and versatile.
pros: Highly rated not only for its quality design and craftsmanship, but also for its ease of use
It is also praised for being easy to clean, and we love that its strainer is fine enough that it doesn't leave loose bits of tea behind
It can easily brew tea in a pot or cup
cons: A few users experienced issues with the closure not fully latching – resulting in tea leaves in the brewing water

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a month despite careful use.
customer_reviews.text: The design is cool. The little saucer is a nice feature. Unfortunately, this infuser has a fatal flaw: the clips on the underside of the cap are very flimsy and break off easily. I read about this issue in other reviews so I was very cautious when screwing the lid on; it didn't matter, one of the three clips broke off three weeks after I got the set. Avoid this infuser and look for something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: CT_CT

customer_reviews.title: Reeks Metal Taste
customer_reviews.text: I washed and cleaned these infusers before I used them to steep my loose tea and I tasted a metallic taste. I then boiled them in vinegar and hot water to try and release the metallic taste. Afterwards, I steeped my tea and still the metallic taste. I do not recommend the purchase of these tea infusers because there is a high presence of something metallic. These are probably not stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! For those who mention having issues with them popping open, I think they've misunderstood the mechanism. These do NOT have a snap-on (with downward pressure) top! They have a quarter-turn style where there are three tabs that fit into three slots and you have to give a little twist once the tabs are seated. Then, these do NOT open! Definitely not a design flaw! Also, they do sometimes flip upside down, but that's what the little hook on the end of the chain is for. You pour the water in, the steeper may flip upside down, but then the hook grabs the edge of your mug and the chain won't fall in. Love these! :)
customer_reviews.author: DBaiTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: The Big Dipper
customer_reviews.text: This is the last infuser you'll buy. (Even those who think you're quirky for not using regular teabags will love using it). No loose bits anywhere with this next-tea-perfection infuser. Love the plate that comes with it as well, making it very convenient to just place the infuser on after a quick brew and then cleaning the infuser AFTER you enjoy your cuppa.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Concept is great, first brews I was very happy
customer_reviews.text: So this is perhaps my first Amazon review in over a decade as a loyal Amazon shopper but these were a bust and I would prefer other shoppers look elsewhere. After 3 pots of tea neither lid will close and both hit the trash earlier today. Concept is great, first brews I was very happy, but terrible quality control and design. I advice you look elsewhere at a higher price point. Please let me know if you have suggestions as I like my loose tea without waste of packaging and bags.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Gebhart

customer_reviews.title: Happy teatotaler
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size of the tea infusers. They fit into my 20oz thermal mug and have enough room to make a nice strong tea. The tabs that hold the top in place do not look very robust. Care should be taken to assemble the top and twist in place. It appears that the tabs could bend very easily. See the attached image. Otherwise it is a very well made infuser. It does very well at keeping the tea inside and allowing the water to flow through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this product
customer_reviews.text: The top falls off constantly so you wind up with tea leaves floating in water. Terrible construction.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie wolff

customer_reviews.title: Not great!
customer_reviews.text: It does leak tea particles into my tea to then I have to use my other strainer.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl

customer_reviews.title: Could be better
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn’t last. The top easily comes off and the loose leaf tea floots in your cup. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased loose tea and ordered these shortly after. I like that you get two infusers for the price. I’ve tried them both. The first one I did notice maybe 2 small broken pieces of tea leaves in my cup after the use but the second there was none. I am thinking I may not have secured the top well the first time. They’re easy to open, stay secure while you steep, and also are easy to clean after. I love the small dish and 1/2 teaspoon they come with. It’s a cute little purchase for your tea drinker.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: fun
customer_reviews.text: Nothing better than puttering around with tea-things as I keep up my resolution of quitting coffee. I purcchased the copper set - very durable and the little spoon has a good feel. If a true "tea drinker" ever comes over, will they be impressed??? I don't know.. and don't really care. My goal in life is NOT to impress others (hmmm.. is that why my job stinks & I'm single??.. hmmmm)... As for these copper tea infusers... I like them, I use them, they work in my world.
customer_reviews.author: pink fluffy slipper world

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, you can tell they won't rust easily which is a big deal to me. The quality was a surprise as the metal is thicker than I thought it would be. The flaw I have come across is the lid that clicks in place to seal it. The pins will not hold sometimes and it results in it opening while I steep the leaves. Also as a rule I have found to only fill them up to half as the tea leaves will expand and fill in the space. good overall but just annoying to scoop the leaves out when the lid fails.
customer_reviews.author: Juan L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a cute gift with some loose tea leaves to go with it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a tea-loving friend and didn’t hear anything negative about it so I’m assuming it serves its purpose. I guess it’s not fair to give a rating on something I didn’t personally try but at the same time my friend would likely have told me it sucks if that were the case. Anyways I opened it before I gave to her and it is definitely something I would buy again for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Jeni

customer_reviews.title: Works fine. The clips are fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the saucer is nice and generally the product works well. The small holes means only a tiny out of grit will get through. Not a huge issue. It's very easy to load and use. Easy to clean so long as the tea is not allowed to dry inside the container. Cons: As others said the metal clips are fragile. They bend easily. This has led to the lid coming open during use at times. You can bend them back to make a tighter fit but due to their fragility, they can break off. The product works well with only two clips(each one has three holding the lid down) but would not work well with only one.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Braassfield

customer_reviews.title: These are the best tea strainers I have EVER used (and being a ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best tea strainers I have EVER used (and being a tea addict, that's saying something). These are really well made, easy to clean [basically rinse in hot water] and they allow loose tea leaves to expand ['bloom'] and make a perfect cup of tea. These also work great for herbs in soups/broths.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cheffy ⭐💖🌛Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but too small
customer_reviews.text: Great buy if you're looking for small brew baskets. However, I can understand why they included such a small measuring spoon--these baskets are much too small to actually brew a large cup of tea. The tea swells and doesn't steep right, because it can't expand. I recommend the Finum brewer basket instead, but in medium size if you use a regular mug.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are high quality and work great.
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many different styles of tea infusers over the years with mixed results. Although I have only used these for a couple of weeks so far they work better then anything I have ever used. They are high quality and very well made. As other reviews have stated there is a small amount of residue in the bottom of the cup but I have found this is far less then other infusers I have used. I would highly recommend purchasing these.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Dietrich

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and sturdy, but tarnishes quickly and leaves escape
customer_reviews.text: I bought the two-pack of the gold colored infusers. The pros: I love the look of them, the chain is long enough for my larger mugs, the little dish is fun, and the spoon is surprisingly sturdy. The negatives - these tarnish so quickly. I had them about two weeks before I started noticing discoloration. The other negative, some of my teas escape from the infuser. The first tea I tried with these was a Rooibos tea. About three minutes after putting the infuser in, I thought the lid had come off because I had so many floating leaves! For comparison, I can use the mesh ball infusers for that same tea without the leaves escaping.
customer_reviews.author: Giuliana Gillman

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and looks durable
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to receive this because I drink a cup of tea once a day to help with inflammation. It came with two so I can keep one at home and one at work. It came in a cute package and in three colors (I got the silver one). It seems very secure as appose to the ball one I had before. Time will tell how it holds up. I will get these for my tea drinking friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Severe

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it!! Easy to use, as long as kid is clicked on it doesn’t leak leaves into my tea. I also found it easy to clean which was awesome because I have had some strainers where the leaves get stuck. Lastly, I love the little plate! Makes take tea with me to my bed or outside so simple. No extra plate or spoon needed to hold tea bags I just place it on little plate. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Bluezpoet

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I sent an email to customer service Saturday because some of the words in the directions were so tiny as to be illegible. The next day I found an email with the wording enlarged. That’s taking care of the customer! The infusers have only been used a few times and are quite easy to use and to clean. Very little leaf dust in the bottom of the cup/pitcher. I recommend and will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Polly B

customer_reviews.title: Ultrrafine holes work great.
customer_reviews.text: The infuser works quite well. The holes are very small so even fine tea leaves stay in the infuser and not in the cup. The cap is held in place by three metal tabs that slide into corresponding slots in the base. This system seems to work fine but I do worry about tabs eventually breaking as metal fatigue sets in. Only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great Infusers
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had these tea infusers long but so far I lover them. If you've never tried loose leaf tea you haven't experienced the true enjoyment of tea. These tea infusers are very easy to use, just drop in the tea, put the lid on (make sure it's closed tightly) and pour in the boiling water. In approximately five or six minutes (depending on the teat you use) you will experience a real treat. This company, Apace Living, is also very helpful with tips and suggestions for getting even more enjoyment out of your tea. Give them a try. I'm pretty sure you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: These tea infusers are the best. I liked them so much that I bought ...
customer_reviews.text: These tea infusers are the best. I liked them so much that I bought them for my daughter, and her friends like them so much that they are buying them. I showed them to my wife, who is Chinese, and she wants to buy them for our entire Chinese family who live in China. They are easy to use, easy to open, and are made of stainless steel and remain bright and new looking after repeated use. It is also interesting to note that the tea spoon intended for use to load the infuser is very heavy duty and of high quality. I will be buying more of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value for tea drinkers
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. The holes are small enough that I don't get grounds at the bottom of my cup, even with fine teas and infusions. The hook hangs neatly on the edge so I never lose the tea basket, even when I'm drinking from a tall travel mug. And the wee little saucer is perfect, keeps my desk/table dry and doesn't take up much room.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Lucia

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are a great product, they come in a two pack which is very convenient. They are made from stainless steel and are very durable, I absolutely love these tea infusers oh, we'll definitely be buying from the seller again in the future if I ever happen to need anything that they are selling, fast shipping and a reasonable price, made of excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: TC Harpold

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and fragile
customer_reviews.text: Already dulled and old looking after two uses. The chain already came apart on the one I used as well. Would not purchase this type again. Too fragile and awkward to use too. I’ll get the “spoon type” instead.
customer_reviews.author: Tippie Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Very thoughout and well Designed
customer_reviews.text: Quality is very good although the lids clip on with a twist which makes me worry about down the road but I'm sure they could be re-bent if the become to loose. Love the measuring spoon for tea leaves and the small coaster to place them on after they have been used. Give them a try and I think you will like them as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to use and great price
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set and super easy to use. I read the reviews about people having a problem with the twist top but I find it very easy to put on and to take off. It is my first time using an infuser and I am extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon 1969

customer_reviews.title: the infusers are fantastic, but with one little problem
customer_reviews.text: Overall, the infusers are fantastic, but with one little problem. One of my infusers broke within three days of use - one of the clips that holds the screw-on cap to the bottom of the infuser broke off without warning. I was quite careful with it, but the second I pulled on the chain to pull it out of the tea, it snapped and the leaves went EVERYWHERE in the tea. Thoroughly disappointed with an otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: I very happy with my order
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea strainer I've been using it every single day since I purchased it.. Very easy to clean.. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Shyi'Quoya Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great support
customer_reviews.text: Works great. First batch, it opened so I got to sift through the leaves to drink the tea. Per instructions, I tightened the little hooks and then noticed I needed to turn it more. Has worked fine since. For me, I wish the chain were longer but for normal cups, it is fine. I happen to use a large mug that holds about 25-30 oz's of tea so the I have to wrap chain around the handle to hook itself. Support seems great too. They send out advice emails on how best to use your product and the message comes across friendly. I will do some of the advice.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Rundquist

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Infuser I ever purchased!
customer_reviews.text: This Tea Infuser is very well made and is worth the cost. I am very impressed with its ultra fine strainer, no leaves in my tea cup. I would recommend it to my friends and to anyone who enjoys a fine cup if tea. Since I received this product, Apace, the seller and manufacturer has sent a few eMails to me, well before I wrote this review, thanking me for my purchases and including helpful hints on brewing a good cup of tea. I find that this caring for their customers is indeed rear and I truly wish to thank them for such a fine product. So thank you very much APACE, KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK.
customer_reviews.author: L. Driscoll

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love the infusers
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love the infusers, they are terrific! Easy to put the tea in, keeps the tea in place and can set it out and re-steep later, after a great cup of tea. We did get the oolong and it is terrific. If you tea drinkers out there want an outstanding product to use with your tea of choice this is it..... You simply can not go wrong. Very well made and the tea scoop is perfect. AND, everything you advised on using the infuser is right on the money. You guys are awesome, thank you so much for such a great product. Wish we would have found it years earlier!!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Rice

customer_reviews.title: Well made and works well - be sure to put the right amount of tea leaves in, too much will cause top to pop off
customer_reviews.text: Seller provided excellent support instructions and they work well! Only thing is that the tea seller helped more with a problem I had, which was I was stuffing too much tea into the infuser which caused the top to pop off when pulling it out of the cup. Be sure to check how much tea is called for, in my case it was a teaspoon, and that really expands when absorbing the water.
customer_reviews.author: BGH

customer_reviews.title: Much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and high quality. Being an engineer, I can get really picky about manufacturing quality. The online photos reflect exactly what you will get, except that when you actually hold the pieces in your hand you'll be pleasantly surprised at the craftsmanship. Many items like this at this price point end up feeling cheap and flimsy. Not these infusers. They're very well made. The saucers are just as good, and the spoon is solid. I can honestly say that the whole package is well worth the price, and much better than I expected!
customer_reviews.author: J. Soltis

customer_reviews.title: very nice looking infuser
customer_reviews.text: very nice looking infuser. You need to get used to locking it. Otherwise, I have no complains. I like that fact that the sellers sent a follow up email not only to ask for reviews, like how most sellers do, but also gave some good tips on how to make good tea and also how to care for your product.
customer_reviews.author: shreyasc97

customer_reviews.title: Little details to make your life easier.
customer_reviews.text: I use these for tea and to use herbs in my vinegars and brines, etc. when I don't want excess herbs & spices in the final product. The tops come off easier than trying to open tea spoons and tea balls. The little trays and spoon are nice touches--- Little details to make your life easier. I will buy more of these. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: sprite

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and Useful!
customer_reviews.text: These tea strainers are so beautiful, I feel absolutely magical when using them :D they hold a good amount of leaves, so whether you want a regular cup or an iced tea, you’ll be set!
customer_reviews.author: Palma Janelle Nardozza

customer_reviews.title: Steeper doesn't stay closed, product ineffective
customer_reviews.text: One of the steepers' lids doesn't securely close so no matter how gently you pour hot water into the cup, the steeper comes undone and leaves explode everywhere into the cup. So frustrating and pointless.
customer_reviews.author: jess

customer_reviews.title: Works well and sits upright
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this tea steeper for about a week now. It hold more tea leaves than the circle tea steeper’s because it’s sits upright like a up. Slight changes to the color of the gold steeper if it’s not taken out of a damp cup and dried well. I only needed on so I gifted the second tea steeper to a friend because it was so cute.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This tea infuser was exactly what I was looking for. I don't (or haven't yet) put loose leaf tea in it but I do put my bags of tea in there, close it up and let it steep. It's easy to retrieve, easy to open and close and because it's built so well, you can tell that it will last a good long while. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: THud

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great tea infuser that keeps the majority of leaves out
customer_reviews.text: Great tea infusers that keep the smaller loose leaf teas in their place (inside the infuser!). Though the little teeth that are used to lock on the lid seem fragile, I've been using them about 3 months and they seem to be pretty robust. One thing I have noticed is that the volume of the infusers is small, so if you typically use 1.5+ tbsp of tea, you will have trouble fitting it. Also, when packed full, it takes more time than normal to infuse the tea, compared to an infuser that fuller immerses the tea leaves and then strains them out afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift!!
customer_reviews.text: The perfect Christmas gift. My wife was looking for months for a set like this, I found it on Amazon and surprised her with it Christmas morning. She loves how well made it is and how rich looking it is.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Great infusers, great price
customer_reviews.text: I just started getting into loose leaf tea, and needed an infuser. These had the highest/best reviews, and for good reason! They're very simple, easy to use and easy to clean. I believe I got a size medium and it fits 2 tsp of tea nicely, and also fits into my (pretty narrow) favorite teacup. I definitely recommend these infusers!
customer_reviews.author: TattooedLady

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Made!
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that these tea infusers are not only very sturdy but as attractive as well. They work beautifully and they clean us so easily. I wash them after each use and lay them on a mat to dry then lay them on a small lace doily for all to see. They came so quickly. I am well pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Welch

customer_reviews.title: “Tea for two anyone”
customer_reviews.text: It is a well thought through and designed tea infuser. Being a Brit and enjoying my earl grey and British Breakfast this is the easiest infuser to use to get perfect results every time
customer_reviews.author: SteveSchia09

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These tea infuses are great! I get less tea debris with these than with previous infuses I've used. And I love the little trays that come with it to set the infuser on when you remove from your tea. Plus the gold color is very pretty. I wanted the purchase the rose gold but it looks like it's no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Boyd

customer_reviews.title: These are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Likely to be ordering more. They seal up tightly and do not leak. The little tea scoop is very handy. They just look classy and quality made. The little drip trays are just the cutest things, and a helpful item to have. Cleaning is a breeze, just twist off the lid, tap the strainer to dislodge the used leaf, and a easy to do a quick wash.
customer_reviews.author: SLB303

customer_reviews.title: quality product
customer_reviews.text: Like the entire package, actually was able to share one of the strainers with a friend who needed one. Easy to use, easy to clean, filters fine loose teas nicely. Another plus, the help and instructions and follow up of the company. They send simple easy to follow instructions and how to.
customer_reviews.author: Northwest

customer_reviews.title: You Will Want to Marry These...
customer_reviews.text: I've been searching for these my WHOLE LIFE. All the other tea balls I've had caused me to get tea leaves in my teeth and floaties in my cup. It used to drive me crazy! But these little cups have tiny holes that keep the tea where it's supposed to be, IN THE ball. I drink tea one hundred million times per day, so I will be using the snot out of these. The only thing that makes me sad is that only two came in the package. I need three so I can put one in my kitchen, one in my office, and one in our camper. Guess I'll be placing another order. :)
customer_reviews.author: The Dainty Flower

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I am moving toward a zero-waste lifestyle, so I decided to start having loose leaf tea. I save a lot of waste buy not buying tea in individually wrapped sachets. Plus, I save a TON of money and get better tasting tea. These infusers have been perfect. I love that they're stainless and the spoon is a great extra. I've used these for both hot and cold-brew tea, and I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Fruitsalad87

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I use them daily at home and the office. I have never had an issue with them and they are easy to hand clean/rinse.
customer_reviews.author: David Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: This tea infuser set is perfect in every way. The infusers work great and are heavy enough to sink to the bottom of the pot. Instructions for use are very detailed and very helpful. I love the little dishes that come with it, to set the infusers on after use - great for easy clean up. The little tea scoop is heavier than I would have expected and very sturdy - and cute. This item exceeded my expectations and is a great value for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: But these little infusers are perfect! Even the scoop included is surprisingly useful and ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have bought these long ago! We were previously using the tea ball clamp thingamajig to get by while our kitchen is renovated and our french press is in a box. A lot of the loose leaf tea would always end up in the cup with that thing. But these little infusers are perfect! Even the scoop included is surprisingly useful and ideal for measuring your tea. We use these daily and absolutely love them. You get a very clean tea. I'm not often this satisfied with a product to write a review about it, but these little guys are totes worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, LOVE my tea diffusers! A beautiful yellow gold to match my other kitchen accessories, easy to clean, easy to tighten and good for small cups to my tall 32oz tea mug. I "gifted" these to myself, but I would/will definitely order them for any family or friend tea-enthusiasts! Great purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Evon.fino

customer_reviews.title: Stays closed, but easy to open.
customer_reviews.text: Nice gadgets. I bought them because the clasp on the mesh ball I was using would come open at times, spilling tea leaves and spices into the water. These infusers use a closing mechanism that requires turning and latching (terrible explanation) that is very secure yet easy to open. Other than that, they're metal baskets that hold the tea and let the water in ... just as they appear to be.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ramm

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tea infuser I've found that doesn't leave a lot of sediment in the bottom of my cup, and the top of the infuser is easy to fit onto the bottom, unlike an inexpensive tea ball I had bought in a local store. As I have always done, I heat extra water in an electric kettle so that I can warm my cup and then toss the water before actually brewing my tea.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Diffuser I Have Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: I like my tea strong and this handy item allows me to adjust the level of flavor. Very well made. The spoon is basically useless however.
customer_reviews.author: Evaluator

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the BEST tea infusers I've EVER bought!! They fit 4 spoonfuls each which allows me to steep a whole gallon of loose leaf tea at one time!! We use Numi Organic Earl Grey for Iced Tea!! These infusers are amazing! Steeps a gallon of iced tea in 20 minutes! Yea!! You won't be sorry with this little investment!! They are the bomb!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather McDermott

customer_reviews.title: Nice Addition
customer_reviews.text: I brew loose leaf tea at least three times a day and most of my teas are a very fine blend and usually leave behind leaves in my glass, however, with this strainer, why not perfect, has held up better than those prior. They wash easily, and the 1/2 teaspoon is my favorite. I am extremely pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Pastor

customer_reviews.title: They are a great size to keep tea leaves loose when used in ...
customer_reviews.text: They are a great size to keep tea leaves loose when used in electric pots. The cove stays on and the small plate and spoon are convenient accessories for filling the infusers and placing wet ones on a surface. I recently used for brewing teas from seeds. Very convenient and effective for good flavored teas
customer_reviews.author: L. Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: very lovely
customer_reviews.text: When my clients need a cup of tea I am happy to make them a cup with these pretty infusers. I love the copper color! They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Browning

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. We haven’t used it but the infusers are well made and sturdy. I came with a spoon and drain plates. I do appreciate the follow up email with tips on how to properly brew tea. I’ll update my review after I’ve used it just to write about its performance.
customer_reviews.author: Maria M.

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Best strainers ever!!! Super easy to use and clean. I’ve used mine for a couple weeks now and they seem like they’re going to last!
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Good for fine teas
customer_reviews.text: I like rooibos tea but the leaves always end up in my cup. Not with this infuser. Very few get through. It's easy to use and the size is perfect for my mugs. When I put the top on it only seems to need a gentle twist. I keep one at home and one at work.
customer_reviews.author: M. More

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful infuser, the holes are very small
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful infuser, the holes are very small, doesn't let leaf pass through, I have used it a lot with boiling water and still looks like new. The spoon helps a lot to measure the serving size for 250mL.
customer_reviews.author: Einer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for fine-leafed teas
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I am pleased by the lack of tea leaves that escape. It is fine enough for all my teas, and I like fine leafed kinds. The only time it seems to let leaves escape is if you moved it around. Where the chain attaches can sometimes lose a few tea leaves, but it is better than ones I have had in the past. Overall I like them quite a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Lovin' it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to clean the set is nice the 1/2 a tea spoon is great for tea survings intead of trying to dig a tea spoon up it's very accessable. The dip trays are great so no tea goes on your counters. Just dump out the tea and rinse it out once for twice. So low mantainence. If you have any tightness issues easy fix any other issues comes with one year warranty. I love this product and very highly recommend it for you, your family, or as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Keene

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Works well but some particulates get through the holes. Some of my herbal teas needed go be strained after brewing.
customer_reviews.author: Hoyt

customer_reviews.title: This infuser is only large enough to steep enough tea ...
customer_reviews.text: This infuser is only large enough to steep enough tea for an 8oz cup. I tried it on a 12 oz cup and the tea was too weak. I had to make two cups and combine them to make 16 ounces for my work mug.
customer_reviews.author: By His Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. But be aware - make sure you tighten the lid well before submerging. The first time I used, when I went to pull up out of the water, the lid popped off. I thought I had tightened it enough, but I hadn’t. They work well and have cute little saucers to place them on :)
customer_reviews.author: Writerspite

customer_reviews.title: Performs perfectly
customer_reviews.text: They are great. No leaves or sediment leaks through. Took me a few minutes to figure out how to secure the lid tightly but once I had the hang of it then it was easy. I plan on traveling with these. I love loose teas, they taste so much better. And this will be easy to take along anywhere. Plus one to share!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are great used this in my 48 ounce teapot worked pretty well but still probably going to get a bigger tea infuser so that the leafs have room for my teapot. This is perfect for a teapot that can hold 4-6 cups of tea (6 ounce cups) than anything bigger but of course you can use the two infusers if your teapot is big enough
customer_reviews.author: AGSwings

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use!
customer_reviews.text: I liked ease of use. Hook at end of chain did NOT stay on...the hook NOT connected to the top...at end of chain.
customer_reviews.author: Shakira

customer_reviews.title: Great Catch!
customer_reviews.text: This loose leaf tea infuser holds most of the tiniest particles in loose tea, open/closes and cleans easily. Also the right size for most of my cups.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item.
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I wish the company made a tray the same color to hold these. Easy to clean, works great. Loose tea does not get into the drink. Happy n will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: yankeefan

customer_reviews.title: Finally a quality diffuser
customer_reviews.text: After having two other diffusers, one by a company I never thought I'd ever have a bad item from (oxo), I'm so pleased to have these diffusers. They're very good quality, very well thought out in design, easy to clean, shiny and attractive. Even better having two in order to have a cup with the hubs!
customer_reviews.author: Lea S

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, easy to use, easy to clean! Tea time all day!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. A good sized loose leaf tea strainer so that I can make an entire pot of tea for the whole family! And I can make a separate one for those who prefer a herbal blend.
customer_reviews.author: 竜姫様

customer_reviews.title: Best Tea Infuser I Have Used
customer_reviews.text: This tea infuser is the best I have ever used. Its tiny holes don't let any tea particles escape. It's easy to clean. Also a wonderful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: pretty great tea infuser.
customer_reviews.text: feel durable and high quality. some tea leaves do escape somehow, but not TOO many.
customer_reviews.author: Brook

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cuppa with no residue
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased so many tea infusers over the years - mainly the "clamping" kind. They all left so many tea leaves floating around in my cup. Finally I have found one that works! It's the perfect size for one cup. Don't fill it all the way - you have to leave room for the tea to expand. The little hook on the edge of the cup makes it easy to pull out. The lid fits tightly and it's easy to clean. Yay! It works and no residue!
customer_reviews.author: Squeege

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, so far
customer_reviews.text: They are both perfect, so far. I've used each at least twice and the covers twist on and off perfectly. They helped make perfect cups of tea when I was sick. 4 stars because I've only had them a short time.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these tea infusers! I am hosting a high tea soon and had trouble finding infusers large enough to make a good size pot of tea. These are perfect! They came individually wrapped, two in a box with saucers and a measuring spoon. The lid has a good locking mechanism but is very easy to open and close. Highly recommend! Seller sent follow up email with additional instructions for use. Very appreciated!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia A. Toti

customer_reviews.title: These infusers are nice. They are well built and they don't come ...
customer_reviews.text: These infusers are nice. They are well built and they don't come apart. They are perfect for dropping directly into a tea pot to brew your tea at boiling temperature. I am taking off a star because they still leave pieces of tea behind. I restrain the tea out of the pot with a Finum cup strainer. Unfortunately, the floating Finums come apart too easily and dump all the tea leaves in your tea pot. I haven't seen a perfect solution yet.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Great set of two
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and have used them a couple of times. They do a great job! The cap clicks into place easily, and if it does get loose over time there are instructions in the box to how to adjust the cap. From the pictures I wasn't sure that the hook was large enough to fit over the lip of our mugs; however, I found this to be no issue. The hook fits over the lip with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Berger

customer_reviews.title: They work but
customer_reviews.text: The tops are very difficult to correctly seal. I have had them open and spill loose tea a bunch of times. If you are careful this are perfectly fine but I wish they wer more screw on vs putting pressure and clicking from top down
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: This is a five star product.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! The drip tray makes it more convenient because you don't have to worry about where to put the infuser when you take it would of your cup. I prefer gold tones over silver tones so you having a gold tone infuser is perfect. I was so impressed with this, I bought one for a friend and a spare so I'll have a nice gift on hand just in case... There is a nice weight to it as well; well constructed. So, if you have been procrastinating, STOP.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Nicey Tea
customer_reviews.text: It's a gift for my uncle. He like using for his loose tea. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Victorious Ron

customer_reviews.title: Cut my finger opening
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty, but a mess to empty and have cut my finger when opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Circus

customer_reviews.title: Better than I anticipated...
customer_reviews.text: I love these little things! They were so perfect for my loose teas. I don't have any pieces of tea leaves in my cup and that makes me happy. They are very well made and of great quality. The little scooper spoon this comes with is great, not made from cheap metal (was not what I was expecting for the price). These exceeded my expectations and I use them on a daily basis several times a day!! I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: RiMarkable

customer_reviews.title: Great as a Gift, Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my sister and mother-in-law for Mother's Day. Split the package and gave one in the box with the spoon and the other in the delicate plastic wrap that it comes in- it all turned out great. My sister and MIL say they work great, latch well, infuse the tea perfectly (no escape of loose tea), convenient to set on the cute little tray, and they're overall very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: ALC

customer_reviews.title: Only OK
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty at first, but the rose gold is starting to rub off now after a couple of months. The top leaks, so you have to hold it up out of the water to prevent loose leaf tea bits from getting in. Still better than other devices I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Joe

customer_reviews.title: Secure. Good looking.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried at first but it holds together really well. Very pretty. A good size. Works well in my teapot. I do not know when I might need another but I know where to look.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the nicest quality tea infusers that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the nicest quality tea infusers that I have ever used. The top fastens securely to the basket, a measuring spoon is included and there is a matching "drip pan" to keep things tidy. The fact that the infusion holes are small keeps the majority of loose tea in the infuser rather than loose in your cup.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Tea infuser
customer_reviews.text: It works great for my needs. Very small holes so not a lot of tea debri
customer_reviews.author: Somebody

customer_reviews.title: Great for Loose Tea Leaves
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to clean. I was worried it would be flimsy or the cap might not screw on properly like some of the other reviews stated, but I didn’t have that problem whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: TinTin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. The lid is a little tight at first and slightly sharp but they’re beautiful and works great.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: A very complete product. I've used numerous tea balls and diffusers, but this by far is the best experience I've had. No tea left stuck after a simple rinse, and the small saucer kept my counter safe between steeps. The small scoop may work better with pearls or non-full leaf teas, but having the full matching set is very nice. A very good set.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for steeping herbs for multiple cups of tea
customer_reviews.text: I grind fresh ginger in my Vitamix, scoop it out with a small scoop and freeze these little mounds for later use. One scoop fits perfectly in these tea infusers to make 2 good sized coffee cups of ginger/green tea. Very pleased! Just be sure to tighten the top before you set it in your teapot of cup so you can use the chain to "dunk" the tea infuser up and down after it's had time to steep so you get all the benefits of the herbs.
customer_reviews.author: KJORE

product_meta.title: Loose Leaf Tea Infuser (Set of 2) with Tea Scoop and Drip Dray by Apace - Ultra Fine Stainless Steel Strainer & Steeper for a Superior Brewing Experience
feature_bullets: ✅ UNLOCK NEW FLAVORS - THE ONLY TEA STRAINER WITH ADVANCED Ultra-Mesh Technology: We tested endless iterations of micro-hole positioning and basket size before creating the ONLY ultra fine loose leaf teas strainer that UNLOCKS EVERY LAYER of AROMA & FLAVOR - for a strong, flavorful brewing experience every time

✅ UNRIVALED CRAFTSMANSHIP, UNPARALLELED VALUE: While most tea infuser sets are 304 STAINLESS STEEL ‘coated’, ours is SOLID throughout, so it won’t rust, dent, warp crack, or taint your tea. LARGE CAPACITY - ENOUGH FOR EVERYONE: 2 tea infusers, 2 drip trays and 1 tea scoop allow you to brew tea for you and your beloved, or a houseful of friends.

✅ DEBRIS FREE TEA – LARGE, MEDIUM & ULTRA FINE LEAVES: Tea ball quickly unlocks the flavors any large, medium and fine tea leaf, even rooibos, without leaching debris into your cup. EASY CLEAN: Simply set the tea infuser on the INCLUDED DRIP TRAYS to cool, then use warm water to RINSE BOTH CLEAN IN SECONDS!

✅ TOXIN-FREE & GORGEOUS - THE GIFT THAT LASTS AND LASTS: Tests show most cheap tea steeper sets leach chemicals into your tea, resulting in poor taste and potential health damage. Our elegant tea set is crafted from the HIGHEST FOOD GRADE materials, then rigorously tested for purity, performance and safety.
